pages.text: Brooms are magical devices commonly used by witches. Through the use of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars#internalme)ME$(), they enable the user to fly through the skies.$(br2)Brooms come in four variants, each with unique properties.
$(l:bewitchment:introduction/juniper_trees)Juniper$() Brooms are the fastest of all brooms, without any other special properties.
$(l:bewitchment:introduction/cypress_trees)Cypress$() Brooms ward the user, reducing both damage input and output.
$(l:bewitchment:introduction/elder_trees)Elder$() Brooms will return the user to where they mounted it after dismounting.

$(l:bewitchment:introduction/dragons_blood_trees)Dragon's Blood$() Brooms can have $(l:bewitchment:sigils/using_sigils)Active Sigils$() applied to them, much like any other $(l:bewitchment:introduction/dragons_blood_trees)Dragon's Blood$() block.
